entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 31 March 2023
